amendment.description: To strike provisions enacted by the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2010 and to improve the bill.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4588 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4588 proposed by Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S6767; text: CR S6767) To strike provisions enacted by the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2010 and to improve the bill.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4588 proposed by Senator Feinstein.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4588 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
